'''On some stars, flowers & places in Middle-earth''' is a small collection of essays on Middle-earth, extracted from previous volumes published by Le Dragon de Brume and translated from French into English.

The volume is available in print, but a full PDF version is also provided on the editor's website. 

== Contents ==

* On the lost tale of Mercury
* On the red star near the Hunterâ€™s Moon
* On Elysian fields of mallos and alfirin
* On a dishevelled dryad
* On flying ships, myths and the Machine
* On the authors & contributors
